thread.title: Palm Beach County Clerk Bock: I'll slash hours, staff
thread.title_full: Palm Beach County Clerk Bock: I'll slash hours, staff | www.palmbeachpost.com

author: Eliot Kleinberg
title: Palm Beach County Clerk Bock: I'll slash hours, staff
text:
Offices at courthouses in Palm Beach Gardens and Delray Beach will close every other Friday, starting this week. Pending and future hiring is frozen and 41 full-time and 16 part-time workers already have been laid off. And the time between filing a lawsuit and seeing it on the online docket will go from three days to as much as two weeks.
Palm Beach County Clerk and Comptroller Sharon Bock revealed Monday many of the grim, and immediate, particulars of $2.6 million in cuts she says she must make to meet a shortfall for the last quarter of her budget year.
